titles.title: RISE from Trauma Act
Resilience Investment, Support, and Expansion from Trauma Act
RISE from Trauma Act
To improve the identification and support of children and families who experience trauma.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
